thread.title: Search panel suggests 10 names for next Election Commission
thread.title_full: Search panel suggests 10 names for next Election Commission

title: Search panel suggests 10 names for next Election Commission
text:
Search panel suggests 10 names for next Election Commission Staff Correspondent, bdnews24.com   19:19:50.0   19:47:55.0 BdST The search committee has finalised 10 names for constituting the next Election Commission. 
The panel members arrived at the Bangabhaban to submit their suggestions to President Md Abdul Hamid on Monday.“The names will not be revealed before they are submitted to the president,” Cabinet Division Additional Secretary Abdul Wadud said after the six-member panel met in the Judges’ Lounge at the Supreme Court. 
The next Election Commission will have no more than five members including a chief election commissioner. 
The search panel headed by Justice Syed Mahmud Hossain finalised the 10 names from a list of 20 during the meeting from 4pm to 6pm.Accompanied by Cabinet Secretary Mohammad Shafiul Alam, the panel members reached President Hamid's official residence at 6:30pm to hand in the suggestions. 
The Cabinet Division has provided secretarial aid to the panel. 
"The panel has finalised the names and the report within due time. The list may contain names recommended by different political parties," said Wadud.
